content.detailedDescription: It's me! amigos 🤘👽 what i have seen, their devices can change their state of aggregation! they disappear in a beam! lightning !!! i love you ! can you remember the creature, in front of the window? there are 3 small luminous dots on the body! i'm sure these are your devices! look at the part where flew behind me, how it disappears! this point is on the body later! i love you ! i saw telecinese teleport s different aliens !
content.summary: Lightning! i have a encounter! i have fear ! they are by me !

content.detailedDescription: In parking lot at apt. noticed to the south in west to east trajectory white orb just above buildings.When about south of my position slightly to east morphed into a red orb then continued on same trajectory to east out of sight
content.summary: White orb observed southeast of parking lot by apt. travelling from west to east.When about south of position on east trajectory morphed from white to red just about 100ft. above buildings went east then out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I was putting my kids to bed, sitting quietly while they were falling asleep. i noticed a light over coxcomb hill. at the time, i lived across the river in springdale. the light grew brighter and brighter. i thought, spotlight? but it wasn’t shining on anything. grew so bright and large, then dropped behind hill super fast. i never saw a helicopter or plane go that fast. it didn’t fall behind the hill. it darted downward, so deliberately, so suddenly. not a natural falling motion.
content.summary: Orb hovers, begins to glow brighter until drops super fast behind hill

content.detailedDescription: Every year, we attend a large gathering of reenactors, medieval period, in western pa. in 2010, my children and i were walking around the campground late at night and observed 4-6 flying objects far off, playing with each other, flying around each other too fast for planes, helicopters. sometimes circling, almost seeming to play tag. bizarre. possible link—our group gets buzzed frequently by military planes in the area. they use our campground to practice counting populations in our tent city. our event is called pennsic, if that helps you look us up. 10-12,000 people every year.
content.summary: 4-6 flying lights, playing with each other. erratic pattern

content.detailedDescription: I took a picture ,saturday 2017 october28,around 6:30p.M.,on my balcony, of the clouds because the clouds was crazy i was with a friend.When i looked at the picture before posting it on instagram 2 days later i saw 3 orbs or lights. maybe a reflection  but the problem is that the space between the objects doesn't match the lights in front of me.And i have another picture without orbs/lights/or objects of the crazy clouds the next day. i previously saw a cylinder long like a football field 1 mile in altitude during a bright day of summer mid afternoon no clouds on a trip to kickinghorse ski resort before i learned of the existence of this things on ancient aliens. i saw flashing moving lights at night for over 30 minutes with 4 friends in 2000 and saw the same phenomenon on a video on youtube without knowing how to save the video in 2011. in 2002 i saw a rectangle flying at 2 miles over my head,i was with 3 friends in a parking lot perfect blue sky and others around was observing it,it lasted 45 minutes. i also witnessed the chinese rocket body entering the atmosphere in calgary,2015 february. i   have been followed by a light on the highway in 2000 with a friend,when we stopped the light disappeared. we started driving and the light did reappeared. we was on the highway. we took an exit and the light followed to disappear just in front of our eyes. we was completely alone in an area without any lights at 3 a.M. we drove away full speed completely in shock......No time missing or close contact,only followed by a weird light without any noise. aliens don't contact the masses to avoid panic. slowly humans understand that we aren't alone in the conscious known universe or multiverse that we live in.All my sightings are with different friends.
content.summary: Saw 3 orbs saturday appearing only on a sky picture with 4k camera,other events to report

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a boy scout campout with my son. it was a cold morning, we both woke up around 5:00am. we were the first ones up so we started the campfire back up. as the campfire began to grow, my son went to the bathroom. i looked up at the sky, scattered clouds to the se, to check the incoming sunrise on the horizon i notice to the n-ne a bright white light at a very high altitude moving w at a not so slow speed. (on a side note, i am a licensed a&p mechanic. i am very familiar with aircraft!) i saw no flashing beacon lights. my first thought when i saw the light was it's the iss. as i continued to follow it moving w across the morning sky, it started to slow down as it approached, what i saw as a cluster of stars. approximately 10 "stars". at that time i noticed a second light approaching from the s of the "cluster of stars" at a slowing speed similar to the first light. when both lights joined the cluster i lost track of the two individual lights. in a matter 15-30 seconds after i lost track of the two lights in that cluster, the cluster just dissappeared. all of this happened in about 5min.

this experience has left me a little uneasy. i don't know what to think anymore. did i really just happen?
content.summary: Very strange lights in the sky. two lights moved into a cluster of many lights & disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was playing hide and go seek with other young kids at a bowling alley on a monday. my mother was on a bowling team. i was maybe 9 or 10 years old. if i remeber correctly the name of the bowling alley was northeastern bowl.I grew up in indianapolis all my younger years which means ive see the goodyear blimp alot .It use to fly right over my house as a child every year. so i know what it looks like from every angle. so as i was playing hide and go seek, i looked up to see if my friends were hiding in some trees or possibly on top the building. thats when i noticed the object hovering, moving very slowly like a blimp. if i would have looked up sooner it would have been right over my head .Im going to say around 200 to 500 feet above me. but it was at an angle. moved very slowly like a blimp but it was not a blimp. it zig zagged across the sky and never changed shape. if a blimp zig zags it changes shape depending on the angle that you are viewing it at. so i called my friens in to help me identify the object. most of them were younger than myself.So they didnt know what they were seeing. so i went inside to get an older person to view the objest,they refuse to come outside. they thought we were making the whole thing up. so i ran back outside and watched the object continue to traverse the sky for around 15 to 20 minutes back and forth untill it went over the horizon. the strange thing about it was it had dull yellow lights spinning aroung the outside edge in a very random order. now imagine the goodyear blimp with lights so bright that even when the sun was still up that u couldnt possibly read the scrolling words on the side of it.To me it seemed  like it was trying to mimic a blimp but the lights were so bright it looked fuzzy. now if i was paying money for advertizement on that blimp i would want my money back. because there is no way to read what was spinning around the edges of this thing. the more i thought about the way this thing moved across the sky it made me think that it was looking for something like scanning the ground.And ever since the day i witnessed this i have been searching for something that would at least look like what i saw that day. i havent found and exact match yet anywhere.And im 53 years old now .
content.summary: Round flight path was a zig zag pattern low to the ground lights very bright fuzzy looking. imagine the goodyeard blimp very close but the lights were so bright it made the sun look dim in comparison

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my son to work and on my way back from dropping him off heading northbound on main street i witnessed a large dark (dull and black in color) triangular shaped object (at first i thought it was a plane) hovering and slowly, slowly rotating in the sky. three red lights, one white. i observed it clearly for 5 minutes, 2 minutes of which i pulled over to the side of the road and stared at it in awe.The three red lights were at the tips of the triangle with one white light that was next to one of the red lights.The lights all flashed, strobe-like in unison.  the underbelly had 4 square-shaped "panels", one directly in the middle of the triangle, and one each alongside the straight lines of the triangle. this craft was large, it had to be 200 foot in diameter and was about 250 feet above me. it made no noise at all, and just hovered and slowly rotated. i was headed north on main street, but after this craft started to move, i quickly made a u-turn and started following it. it picked up speed, not super speed, but kind of like it noticed me following it and decided to go faster. it moved in a sw direction over manor hill elementary school in lombard, il. as soon as i approached the nearby park south of the school i lost sight of it because of the trees in the park, and once i was clear of the park, i couldn't see anything in the sky, like it just vanished. i had attempted to use my phone camera/video, but the app froze and wouldn't open.  never did i ever think i'd see something so strange, but yet so awesome in my life i had an extremely good view of this thing and my heart is still pounding fast from observing this.
content.summary: Dark triangular shaped craft, three red lights, one white all strobing. 2 minutes hovering another 3 until obscured by trees.

content.detailedDescription:
Ce soir la je rentrais du concert d un amis au bar restaurant l ã©tage ã  paris et en arrivant en bas de l immeuble de mon frã¨re ã  bagneux j ai appelã© mes enfants qui vivent au quã©bec pour leurs parler avant d aller me coucher.
a un moment comme je regardais un peu partout pendant que je telephonais j ai regarder au dessus de l immeuble qui est en face de celui de mon frã¨re et la j ai vu une boule orange sortir de derriã¨re l immeuble suivi ensuite par deux autres qui volais parallã¨lement et a la mãªme vitesses puis une quatriã¨me et peut ãªtre une minutes aprã¨s une cinquiã¨me est apparue.
lorsque j ai vu le premier objet j ai trouvã© sa irrã©el ã  cause de la couleur la forme et la distance au dessus de l immeuble j ai vite raccrocher mon tã©lã©phone et deux autres lumiã¨res sont apparues et volais cã´te ã  cã´te et j ai commencã© ã  filmã© avec mon tã©lã©phone qui est un galaxie note 4 au fur et ã  mesure qu elle avanã§ait la lumiã¨re de droite ã  commence ã  baissã© d intensitã© et la seconde ã  fait la mãªme chose quelques secondes plus tard j ã©tait sur exiter mais je n ai rien dit car j ai dã©jã  filmã© un ovni ã  cã´tã© des chutes montmorency au quã©bec un soir et les gros mots j'aillssaient de ma bouche tellement j ã©tait exiter donc j ai fermer ma bouche cette fois ci et puis pensant que c ã©tait terminã© j ai arrãªtã© de filmã© et puis le temps de regarder mon tã©lã©phone voir si sa avait filmã© je relã¨ve les yeux au ciel et la une quatriã¨me boule pasait au dessus de l immeuble donc je rallume l appareil photo et je vois une cinquiã¨me boule passer au dessus de l immeuble et je me suis empressã© de la filmã© et aucun de ces objets ne faisaient de bruit de plus l heure et surtout la hauteur sans compter la forme la couleur oranger ne pouvais ãªtre un ou des avions et i n y avait surtout pas les lumiã¨res anti collision que l on vois habituellement clignoter sur les avions de plus bagneux ce situe ã  cã´tã© de la ville de fontenay aux roses qui a ã©tã© classã© en zone p du fait des istallations nuclã©aire qui y sont pour finir ce soir la le ciel ã©tait dã©gagã© la lune ã©tait presque pleine et on pouvais voir un lã©ger voil brumeux ã©clairã© par la lune les lumiã¨res ont toutes baissã© d intensitã© jusqu'ã  disparaã®tre dans la mãªme zone un peu avant d arrivã© au niveau de la lune
content.summary: J ã©tait au tã©lã©phone avec mes enfants qui vivent au quã©bec quand j ai aperã§u une sã©rie de cinq lumiã¨re orange passã© au dessus de l immeuble

content.detailedDescription: I accidentally spotted an object when i looked at the clear blue sky in my backyard. it wasn't aircraft. it was ufo. i took pictures and then it disappear.
content.summary: Accidentally spotted above

content.detailedDescription:
I was a security guard at a house . i was in my truck when i saw this white
 light off in the distance to the east . it looked like the light on a plane i kept watching it when it started to get bigger so i got out of my truck to watch . when it went by me it was so close i could have hit it with a stone . it was heading west . when it was past me it gave a noise like jet motor but real soft it sounded like a recording then i lost it over the trees . i hade no phone or camera with me so i never told anyone till know . i wrote it down on a peace of paper and drew what i seen . i still have it.
content.summary: Like large capsel with one red light on the bottom . about  20ft high  12 ft at the bottom

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i do not want to be public with our names and who we are. it seems since you already have my phone number. i would like to ask you to be discreet with the information you have already compiled.   i do not have good health, and had a new heart valve put in last march.  my wife and i are just a middle grandmother and grandfather.  i’m a 100% disabled veteran since 2004.  we are both 65 years of age. please respect that?
on aug. 25th, 2017 at approximately 8:30 pm my wife and i were looking forward to getting to a location where we could get settled in for the night. we were riding in our 37 foot diesel pusher at a speed of about 60 miles per hour, slightly downhill, travelling southeast on highway 550, and a few miles south of napeezi, new mexico   
we had been talking about how the roads had changed 2 lanes to 4 lanes since the last time i had driven.  out of nowhere i saw a light flash in front of me, it had come from my left.  i instinctively looked to my left and i saw 2 creatures setting about 2 foot apart, very bright craft which was at my eye level while setting in the motorhome. 
i instantly seemed to take a mind picture of what i was seeing.  at that time we were maybe 80 feet and gaining on their position. my first thought was is this real, the closer we got the more positive i was that what i was seeing was real when i made eye contact. 
some points i saw was;
the craft did not appear to have a windshield.  
the panel in behind the creatures gave off a very bright light, as did the floor and ceiling.  it was as bright as a operating room under full lighting. there was as small stem that came up from the floor in front of the creatures. it stood about 40 inches out of the floor. it seemed to support a  small control panel that was thinner the a carton of cigarettes. the guy on my left had his gopher looking hand resting on it.  
the moment i saw them, the individuals were looking down the road as if looking for something to arrive. there was a truck coming up the hill toward us and about a 1/8th of a mile away. the craft seemed to swing and rotate from the shoulder on the other side to a lane away was at my side and maybe 20 foot away.  once they rotated enough that their faces was 180% to us, he saw us and disappeared.  as we drove on down the hill i looked in my mirrors and side camera and didn’t see anything related to them after that.
a description of the creatures we witnessed:
both individuals had a skin tone about the same as mine, i’m a white male. they had large heads in a upside down teardrop shape, very large black eyes, a small mouth and 2 small holes for a nose. there were holes for the ears but only a nub for ears. very much like the drawing you would see in roswell, accept not green, but green uniforms. the one on the right had a very smooth face. the one on the left appeared to be older with facial lines. the one on my left wrinkled his right side of his mouth when he saw me, but they were talking when we interrupted them.
i made eye contact with the one on my left and looked directly into his large black eye.  his eye was the finest surface i had ever seen.  the eye had no abrasions or scratches , no dust or mucus. .  i noticed  that under the surface of this perfectly clear outer surface of the eye was a grid of many individual eyes, like a fly’s eye’s but much smoother super fine glass surface.
their bodies where skinny and were illuminated with a greenish glowing uniform. also there was roll type cuffs  that also glowed, but was a beige. 
they reminded me of stick people. the arms and the torso were slender and about the diameter of a very small child of 6  or 7 years of age. 
the hands reminded me of the shape of gophers. but these creatures are large in height and reach, that hand appeared to me to be a lethal weapon.
their torso was long and skinny and appeared to be weak if depended on. but i believe the suit they wear is their body strength.
the back wall is very hard to explain because i believe however they traveled was behind that wall. the wall was very brightly illuminated.  it appeared to be divided into about 18 inch cubes but wasn’t, it was a flat surface.   the light seemed to be boiling along the edges of each panel in the colors of light greenish, blue, violet.  but the power heaved with its changes it seemed. the back panel was incredibly beautiful and something i’ll never forget it.

we could not see the outer body of the craft because we were looking into very bright light. 
as for hearing anything i felt i heard them communicating when we approached.  i wear hearing aids and they were stretching like a fax machine.  

i looked at google maps at the location of thr incident nd found something interesting.  please look at the land above the cliff.  its as if dozer work had been done. i have no idea what the bright object by the road might be.  this could be something natural, but they turned and went somewhere. 
i added a drawing someone did that is similar to the creatures we saw.  but the ones we saw did not have the body ma's these do and the ones we say we're wearing uniforms that seemed have the ability to move and protect them.  although they were greenish they had  glow of energy about them.  
i hope you have taken time to consider what i shared with you.  i would like to know what is going on there.  i hope to go back and spend a month or 2 searching for them.
content.summary: Could not see back,  but front had 2 occupants and appeared to be open (no windshield) saw directly into craft

content.detailedDescription:
10 minutes before sunset my friends pointed out ufo hovering silently at 35-40 degree angle for about 5 minutes above intersection of schaumburg rd, and barrington rd. it then traveled east along schaumburg rd to meacham rd where it traveled north to algonquin road where we lost it behind trees.
 we were discussing upcoming trip when sighted. it was clear to the 3 of us, and two friends a mile away what it was. we were amazed, not scared, but i forgot the loaded camera in glovebox until it was gone. we talked about for 1/2 hour after. my girlfriend mentioned to coworker/friend, discovered he and his girlfriend witnessed also. his description was identical, as was timing/pathway. my belief in off planet life was confirmed totally.
content.summary: Initially craft hovered, then traveled due east, turned north, then traveled west out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I was playing 'it' with my friends and hid underneath a neighbor's tree to evade them.  then i ran to the fire pump and turned around. that's when i saw this metallic object sitting on the branch that must have been above me the entire time i was hiding under the tree.  it looked like the size of a keg of beer with the exception of a fish eye type of lens in the center that seemed to be like a camera.  that's what i thought it was; some high tech camera.  the object was moving extremely slow in a clockwise position as if taking in the scenery. i felt amazed that this thing would be interested in what a bunch of little kids would be doing.  i remember thinking we're being watched for some reason i couldn't fathom.  i ran along and when i turned around to look at it again it was gone, poof, as if it were a figment of my imagination.  the first thing i thought was, "gee, it must have decided we are really boring."  i had one dream since that time about being taken away from earth and screaming as our planet has become smaller and smaller.  i have no memory of being abducted though, and i am very glad that i don't.
content.summary: Siliver barrel type object with a lens in the center sitting on a tree branch moving in a clockwise manner as if observing everything around it, like a camera

content.detailedDescription:
We were returning from mesa verde park, when we were stopped for half hour while they removed power lines from one side of road to make room to pass. object was the shape of two plates inverted on one another. i have always had an interest in trucks, this seemed twice the normal size. it seemed by itself to take up the whole two lane highway.
  state police directed us to park on shoulder. after approximately 20 minutes was when we first saw truck/disc. utility 
oles were off each shoulder by about 15 feet. road was about 25' wide , meaning they needed more than 60' clearance. truck was moving about 10 mph, and passed within 15' of us.
  i was 7 years old, in accelerated learning classes in cherry hills, nm, near portland afb at time. i asked my dad what could that be. i don't know.
 it was totally covered, but the size, shape, and presence of 5,6 military jeeps, and trucks accompanying, many soldiers, and removal of poles for clearance left impression on me. i forgot about this until many years later. i knew nothing about ufos at the time
  i have tried since to connect this with reports, but nothing lines up except general time frame, and of course the fertile triangle of land with many other events.
content.summary: My family returning from daytrip saw covered disc on huge military trailer.

content.detailedDescription: I dont have the tech to take a good video of it/light that would do the sighting of any justice and the fact of the matter is i get to see them quite regular, all you have to do is look to the sky all the time particularly in the late hours of the morning, it apears to be the best time to see them.I carnt beleave knowone els sees them ,mind you not many people look up i sapose, and are up in the morning at that time.Happens all the time why its not on the knews blows me away. the question boxes above pretty much describe the events about the only thing i could add is that the light can move nearly and do sometimes move faster than the eye can see and can come to a stand still just as fast.
content.summary: Nothing man made can move through the air like this,i only wish i could get a closer look at them

content.detailedDescription: It is still there outside my living room tv window has happened countless times. moved from left to right its like a round basketball shape very bright and beaming. then while taking pictures i saw 1 or 2 tiny round balls to the right and left of this basketball and the two little ones seemed to temporarily turn blueish in color. right now at 9:46 p.M. it is back to only white color and back to basketball shape and has moved from the left in beginning to more towards right.
content.summary: Saw outside my living room window while watch t.V. happened many times hovering over outside window

content.detailedDescription: Bright circular object spotted while walking dog. i always sky watch as a hobby. the object was a very bright and steadily lit. it did not waver or flash like an aircraft. i noticed it at approximately 30 degrees above the westerly horizon until it disappeared behind low cloud cover in the east.  sighting occurred at approximately 7:15 a.M. atlantic standard time 10/31/2017.  weather clear w/few dissipating clouds. sunrise was at 8:02 adt
content.summary: Bright circular object in morning sky moving rapidly at high altitude west to east

content.detailedDescription: Hovering solid looking object above horizon, stationary when first observed. the object ascended to the ne, taking several minutes to disappear from sight. made no sound and did not have lights. please zoom in on pictures and video. images captured on iphone camera.
content.summary: Hovering object

content.detailedDescription: Hovering solid looking object above horizon, stationary when first observed. the object ascended to the ne, taking several minutes to disappear from sight. made no sound and did not have lights. please zoom in on pictures and video. images captured on iphone camera.
content.summary: Hovering object

content.detailedDescription: Hovering orb observed for several minutes. the object ascended northeast from my location. no sound or lights.
content.summary: Hovering orb, then ascending northeast. the object was close when first observed.

content.detailedDescription:
Going fishing in our old 1952 milk truck camper from webb city to table rock lake on route 76 outside cape fair on the straight part of road high up.  i was 16, sitting on the engine cover with my dad driving.  it was 30 mins short of night and straight ahead, i see a very bright star-like object hovering 300-600 meters above the road.  we both knew, it couldn’t be a star, it was still too light out.  it was at least 8-10 miles away, we i noticed it.  it shot of a short burst of flames out to one side, the maneuvered at incredible speeds, up, side to side, down, shot another burst of flames from one side, with more sharp movements.  i told my father, it’s our brothers from another planet and they are here, just for me to see.  after driving and watching for a few miles, we pulled over in an old mountain top cafe/filling station, the kind with glass pumps.  i told my little brother to get all the people out of the cafe and we all stood by the 2-lane road watching it (looking toward the east), not too far from cape fair.  
the bright object (saucer) moved slowly towards us.  i was thrilled!  a dream come true!  just earlier in the summer, i told my mom, as we looked up at the stars, i wished i could see a space ship one day.  everyone had came out of the restaurant (about 15) and were totally silent as we watched it slowly come to a stop, right above us, about 80-100 ft away.
it was an extremely bright metal exterior with no windows.  it had a curved sloped dome and was about 100 feet wide and 60 ft tall.  the outside edge was about 2 meters thick and rounded.  underneath, it had a dark black ring 4ft from the edge, about 2 ft wide.  it didn’t make a single noise or whisper!  
the cafe had cleared all the trees across the road for a nice few across the valley and about 15 miles to the next mountains to the south.  after watching it travel towards us for 15 mins and hovering for 15 mins more, it slowly moved to the south, down the mountain, for a few secomds out of our view, then reappeared down in the valley, flying right above the ground.  it started picking up speed and as it approached the next mountain, shot straight up into the sky and out of earth’s orbit.  it was now dusk and the sun was shining brightly off the ship and we could see it for quite a while as it shot up into space.
all this time, nobody said a word.  at the end, this guy says - “should we report this to the sheriff?  i replied, “do you know what will happen to our fishing trip, if we report it?  people will bug us for years!”  as far as i know, nobody reported this event in so missouri and decided to finally do it!  this experience changed my life for the better.  i’ve had other amazing experiences since, that i won’t report.  loyalty, means keeping secrets.  i had a 27 year career in the army, ranger, sf, counter terrorism, intel, and emergency management at the national and international level.  i remember the spaceship, like it was yesterday.  it helps to have a photographic memory for images and numbers.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: bright silver saucer, 80 ft wide wi. de and flew right  above us, a 30 min event, then watched it gain speed and leave earth as the sun reflected. off it.

content.detailedDescription: i gaze at the stars several times each night. i was looking out the glass door, and noticed a very bright star, low in the sky. the only one that low, just above the tree line. as i'm looking, i wondered, 'did that just move?'. i watched, and, yes, it was moving. sorta hovering, but also moving. in any direction it wanted. it went up, down, did arcs and circles. i went to get an adult to see, but he was asleep. this was just after midnight. my kids were up, ages 11,12,and 13, so i called them. independently, i asked them, 'do you see anything in the sky?' they each remarked on the brightest star, just above the trees. one at a time, they asked me, did that move? lasted about 10 minutes, i was glued to the window. my eyes ere crying.  then star ducked below tree line momentarily, then path straight out sw direction, until we lost sight of it, which took about 4 seconds.
content.summary: Looked like a very bright star, but it moves.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work along otay lakes road around 9:30 pmon 10/30/17  i saw a hovering  dark triangular shaped object over jamul mountains (possible near a rock quarry, i looked on a map to see if there may a power station to explain what i saw). i was looking for this object because i saw the same object near the same area on my way to work around 5-5:30 a.M. on  10/28/17 two days earlier. this morning the object was hovering but appeared to be teetering a bit . i saw at least one small red light a few pale red lights and small bluish colored lights all around the bottom edges of the dark object. both times the view became occluded with a mountain and i couldn't find it when i was in the clear after that. perhaps you can see if there were any power stations or something near by, there is a tiny airportjon the road i was taking and just south of where i saw the object 

i have seen a huge silent and triangular low hovering object in az in broad daylight directly above me only a few hundred meters up several years ago and i have been looking in the skies ever since to see if i can see another one. i am positive this one was a ufo it was flat gun metal black color with what looked like 3-5 canister shaped (boosters?) on the under side motionless and silent. couldn't understand why no one else seemed to see it, my grand daughter first pointed it out while we were driving down the freeway, i think it was near the university of phoenix
content.summary: Triangular hovering over jamul mountain as i was driviing from chula vista hovering over  jamul quarry or jamul mountain

content.detailedDescription:
Esta mañana pasamos el puesto de gendarmería de mina 1 en santa cruz, argentina y seguimos por la ruta provincial 20 con dirección a la frontera, en la curva justo antes de pasar la frontera y como a 1 km y medio de la gendarmería vimos hacia la izquierda del camino un helicóptero blanco grande y con sus aspas girando aterrizado en el campo, no tenía número y si solo un símbolo de color rojo.
bajamos la velocidad para sacar una fotografía pero el motor del auto se detuvo y se apagaron los celulares y la cámara de fotos.
entonces atravesó el camino justo delante nuestro de derecha a izquierda velozmente una figura de la altura de una persona pero a la que no se le veían las pantorrillas ni los pies y que aparecía y desaparecía a medida que avanzaba.
cuando llegó al helicóptero se metió en él como zambulléndose y el aparato emitiendo solo un sonido como un rumor apagado se elevó solo un poco y rozando las copas de los árboles fue rumbo hacia el este mientras ascendía por la ladera del cerro que bordea el camino.
antes de llegar a lo alto de cerro el helicóptero desapareció, se hizo invisible en un instante.
apenas desapareció volvió la electricidad en el auto y los dispositivos.
acordamos no decir nada de lo que vimos y seguimos viaje hasta el puerto de frontera dorotea de carabineros de chile que está a unos 3 km.
mas tarde hicimos lo 20 km hasta puerto natales pero tuvimos que hacer una parada en el camino porque uno de mis hijos mayores se descompuso y le dieron vómitos.
content.summary: Vimos un humanoide en la frontera

content.detailedDescription: One warm evening night in 2015. i went outside in my backyard to have a smoke to look at the evening sky. it was dark but still a little light. i looked straight up and saw a solid black object just slowly hovering over our house. no sound or lights. the shape was like the stealth plane. but the tail was different & no sound or plane lights. just saw it floating over our house and go northwest. i did not notice any airplanes & there were no noices like crickets. it was very quiet for this time.  i know i saw this object because i could see the outline in the darkness if the sky & it blocked out the stars as it floated away. i have always thought if this event. i have thought in the past i saw ufo's. in salt lake city. but mostly here in ca. also, another event at our house my son & bf saw lights red blue orange & white. i turned on my flashlight in it & it zipped away very fast. the other day i saw in the daylight time. it looked like a see through parachute like floating in the sky east ti west. the ends were silver color bars. this the 1 st time i have ever put or said this online.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large black triangle with a small notched at tail end. no sound or lights solid black just floating northwest. wasn't quiet dark & i saw the outline. very quiet too.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving and my husband said look at that, what is it? i observed a rectangle shaped object hovering very close to us...It was quite large. as we tried to move closer we took 2 pictures and then all of a sudden it seemed to change shape somewhat and then it was miles away from us. it looked very small at this point. we tried to follow it but it just disappeared from our sight.
content.summary: Saw object in sky and took 2 pictures- then it took off as we got closer

content.detailedDescription: I was home on leave from military, was taking girlfriend to a place where we would go for privacy.  it was about 1100pm and was traveling east on central ave, at that time was only one lane. noticed object pacing car and wondered what it could be.  it had green and pale yellow lights pulsating in a clockwise direction around the edge. as i turned off central ave to go north it seemed to be far away across a field, as the area was basically all farmland and one small development. once we got to our destination which was a deserted road in the woods we got in the back seat and at that time i looked up out of the rear window i saw the object fly over the car and i began to wonder if it was aliens trying to capture us to put in a zoo on their planet so i took off as fast as i could go through the winding road back to central ave. just as i was coming down the road to the intersection to central ave. i looked out of the right passenger window and saw the object coming.  now all the time before it seemed to be a small object but as it approached the car i realized this thing was huge, probably as big as a football field it covered the whole road. when it got directly over the car it, for about maybe five seconds hovered then began to move away from the car  in a southwesterly direction.  but when it was approaching the car it came from a slightly nw direction. when i got to the stop sign at the intersection to central ave i saw headlights from another car which was a state police officer i got him to stop so i could show him the object but he would not even take time to look, telling me it was probably an airplane circling to land at andrews afb.  but i knew because as i said i was home on leave and was stationed at ft. kobbe in the canal zone which is part of howard afb and i saw all types of military plane, so i knew it was not something from the military.  plus even today there is nothing i have seen that could move like this object which within about five or ten seconds went from a very small object in the sky to the size of a football field. furthermore as it began to move away from the officer and myself it seemed to go into a stealth mode where the object became invisible and all you could see was the lights pulsating.  when the object was directly over the car it looked like glowing aluminum or magnesium alloy.
content.summary: Noticed object pacing car, then later saw it pass over car,  began to leave area and object came directly over car and hovered, then began to move away, was enormous it moved in a way like it was moving through time.

content.detailedDescription: This was about 6:30p.M. at night, was taking my dog out for walk, the moon was low in southern horizon when i noticed bright white light 1000-2000 feet agl, at first thought it was an airplane that just took off from airport but then got to watching more closely then seeing the orb shape of 50-60 feet in diameter not making any flight type changes just hovering making no sound. there was bright white light in the shape of orb with yellow-orange halo around entire orb shape, i tracked this orb for approximately 15 min toward ne of where i was standing in front of my house when the orb disappeared like you would turn off light by light switch. i have been sitting outside for 2 months starting in august of 2017 have been seeing guide a few bright lights in the area of big dipped and little dipped area coming from south to north and north to south then just disappearing like turning off light switch. it is like for some reason where i live has turned into a hot spot again for this year again.
content.summary: White orb about 50-60ft diameter hovering path from 500-1000ft from sw to ne disappeared after 15 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Was in my front yard and i always look at the sky, looked to the south and saw the object going from west to east, would stop and hover for a short time then keep on it's straight path then it just disappeared. very shiny reflecting off of then sun rays.
content.summary: Siver or white, looked small bit looked far away, shining in the sun light, hovering
